abstract: The Dow Jones industrials closed down more than 300 points after weak economic data reignited fears of an imminent recession.
snippet: The Dow Jones industrials closed down more than 300 points after weak economic data reignited fears of an imminent recession.
lead_paragraph: In a painful year for Wall Street, even the shortest month couldn’t end soon enough.

headline.main: Stocks Dive on New Signs of Economic Chill
